Mitchell is a former senior executive in DOD who served most recently as the Acting Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense for Special Operations and Low-Intensity Conflict (ASD(SO/LIC)). input_args.claim: 'He also has a background as a highly decorated U.S. Army infantry and Special Forces combat veteran with 28 years of active duty.'
